name: Hot Arrow
description:
Hot Arrow is a pixel art game made for the Level Up Circle: Beginner Jam #1

Controls: A and D to change direction and Space-bar to pause.

Game modes:

  • Normal: Try to reach the max temp before running out of fuel.
  • Infinite: There is no temp nor fuel limit, play as much as you want.
  • Time: Reach the max temp as fast as possible

Please leave a comment with any suggestion or opinion about the game!!!

Thanks for playing!!!
